001package gust.backend.model;
002
003
004import com.google.protobuf.Message;
005
006import javax.annotation.Nonnull;
007import java.io.IOException;
008
009
010/**
011 * Describes the surface interface of an object responsible for <i>serializing</i> business data objects (hereinafter,
012 * "models"). In other words, converting {@link Message} instances into some generic type <pre>Output</pre>.
013 *
014 * @param <Model> Data model which a given serializer implementation is responsible for adapting.
015 * @param <Output> Output type which the serializer will provide when invoked with a matching model instance.
016 */
017public interface ModelSerializer<Model extends Message, Output> {
018  /**
019   * Serialize a model instance from the provided object type to the specified output type, throwing exceptions
020   * verbosely if we are unable to correctly, verifiably, and properly export the record.
021   *
022   * @param input Input record object to serialize.
023   * @return Serialized record data, of the specified output type.
024   * @throws ModelDeflateException If the model fails to export or serialize for any reason.
025   * @throws IOException If an IO error of some kind occurs.
026   */
027  @Nonnull Output deflate(@Nonnull Model input) throws ModelDeflateException, IOException;
028}
